dialogs.name: Injured Soldier
dialogs.context: This town has been heavily destroyed by Imps, we don't know how much we can hold.

dialogs.name: Brann
dialogs.context: Those demons have no right to do that. Don't worry, I'll give them a lesson!

dialogs.name: Injured Soldier
dialogs.context: I did saw them coming from the deep forest. Please see what you can do.

dialogs.name: Injured Soldier
dialogs.context: Our town is in your great hand. May Valor guides your path!

dialogs.name: Injured Soldier
dialogs.context: Seraphim have lost and it's time for us human to face our Judgement.

dialogs.name: Agmund
dialogs.context: Shut your mouth you tiny whiny!
